Title: Inception 2: The Dream Continues
Description: In this highly anticipated sequel, Cobb returns to the dream world for one last job, but this time the stakes are higher and the dreams are more dangerous.

Title: The Last Samurai: Resurgence
Description: Set in modern-day Japan, a disgraced former samurai is forced to confront his past when he is recruited to train a group of young warriors to defend their village against a ruthless warlord.

Title: Space Odyssey: Beyond the Stars
Description: A team of astronauts embarks on a perilous journey to explore a distant galaxy, but they soon discover that they are not alone and must fight for survival against extraterrestrial threats.

Title: The Chronicles of Atlantis: Rise of the Lost Kingdom
Description: When an ancient artifact resurfaces, a young archaeologist must unravel the mysteries of Atlantis and prevent its secrets from falling into the wrong hands before it's too late.
